properties.areaDesc: San Diego County Mountains; Riverside County Mountains; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning
properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 15 at 1:15PM PST until January 17 at 4:00AM PST by NWS San Diego CA
properties.description:
...GUSTY SOUTHWEST TO WEST WINDS IN THE MOUNTAINS
AND DESERTS THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING...

.A storm system moving through Southern California Thursday into
Friday will generate gusty southwest to west winds, mainly along
the mountain crests and desert slopes, portions of the high
desert, and through the San Gorgonio Pass.

* WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph
expected.

* WHERE...Riverside County Mountains, San Diego County Mountains
and San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning Counties. Strongest winds
near the mountain crests and upper desert slopes.

* WHEN...From 7 PM Thursday to 4 AM PST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree
limbs could be blown down.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel may become hazardous for high
profile vehicles traveling along I-8 east of Pine Valley and
I-10 through the San Gorgonio Pass.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THURSDAY TO 4 AM PST FRIDAY
